name: Vex Robotics 3D Simulator
description:
TO EXIT PRESS THE ESCAPE KEY

KEYBINDS: 

Keyboard:

Movement: WASD/Arrow Keys

Shoot discs: SPACE (hold)

Change Rollers: Left Shift

Spawn Preloads: Comma for left preloads, Period for right preloads

Controller: 

Movement: Left Joystick

Shoot discs: Right Back Trigger (hold)

Change Rollers: Left Front Trigger

Spawn Preloads: Square for left preloads, Circle for right preloads

If you want to connect a controller, I recommend following this guide:

If you have any further questions, feel free to email me at davidperezcastellanos@gmail.com
